pages.text: Whenever you pick up one of those little green orbs that appear whenever you kill an enemy, you get smarter - supposedly.$(br2)However, the inevitable death by clumsiness means that you always lose this experience quickly. Crystallized and safely stored in your chests, however, they will be as safe as can be.$()

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: A Gem holds up to 10,000 experience. $(l:enchanting/enchanting_items)Enchanting$() it with $(thing)Efficiency$() increases that limit, $(thing)Quick Charge$() boosts the pushing/pulling of XP.

pages.title: XP Orb Absorption
pages.text: Putting a Knowledge Gem into a $(l:magical_blocks/black_hole_chest)Black Hole Chest$() allows it to absorb XP orbs, putting the experience into the Gem.
